titles.title: A resolution extending condolences to the people of Mexico on the tragic death of Luis Donaldo Colosio.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/25/1994--Introduced. Condemns the assassination of Luis Donaldo Colosio. Extends the condolences of the American people to the people of Mexico, especially to the Colosio family. Pledges the full and unequivocal support of the United States to the Government and people of Mexico.
